item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I’m Marcin. Hmmm… 🤔 What could I say about myself? Maybe I’ll list everything 😄 Games ❤ Board Games 🎲 Card Games 🃏 Video Games 🕹 I have less time than few years ago, but IMO 🎮🎮 are not only for kids 😉 This point could looks complicated, so I’ll divide it for two points: Short version: Movies 🎬 Longer version: Old📼/new, razzies/{B,C,D,…,Z}-Class/(just great and funny in all their weakness) movies 🎥 (ofc.

item.title: Why I made this blog?
item.description: In the chilhood, I had blog only once and never thought, I’ll create any blog again. 😊 About week ago at work, I had to find solution for problem with angular, which I solved half year ago. Digging this same pages led me to fix it. After that, I wrote message to my friend TehGM about it to let my flustration out. He sugested me to create blog and document how I solve problems.
